doc.title: Easy Money: The Movie
doc.plot: One write's screenplays; the other Prosecutes criminals; and the third reports on crime in the city on television; the fourth is a bank teller. Oh, they also rob banks. During the height of a spree of bank robberies, three friends decide to rob a bank to see if they can get away with it. Coincidentally, the man committing the robberies is the nephew of the Mayor of Philadelphia, and the father of the News Reporter is the Special Agent in charge of the investigation. The guys can't stop at one robbery, and they go for it again. At the same time, the Mayor's Nephew robs a bank and leads the FBI agent on a high speed chase on the same highway the guys are using to get away from their robbery. Who will get caught? And who will get away with it?
